name: The Lone Woods
description:
The Lone Woods

You've wandered through a forest for days and arrived at a clearing in the woods. Meet the lone local and assist with a few tasks before continuing your journey onward. 

Note: You may have to left click after loading in to lock the mouse within the game window.

Controls

Movement: WASD & Mouse Steering

Sprint: Hold Left Shift 

Aim: Hold Right Click

Shoot: Left Click while Holding Aim (Right Click)

Switch Weapons: Q

Extras

Source Files:  https://github.com/Kfollen93/The-Lone-Woods

Majority of Assets: https://quaternius.com/
